data.title: 1. Start your ride
data.sub_title:
Press # followed by your OTP

END TRIP button will turn green once the scooter is unlocked.

data.title: 2. Open trunk to take the helmet out
data.sub_title: Press the green button on the left side of the scooter below the seat. If it is a Suzuki Access, then button is below the left handlebar.

data.title: 3. Pause your ride if you're taking a break
4. End your ride on the app
data.sub_title: Press # and END TRIP on the bike. Then, end the ride on the app
